segments.text: In this quiet kitchen, I notice the contrast of the calm exterior and the brewing storm inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside seems a world away from the chaos unfolding in the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s indifference to the water overflow makes me feel unsettled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, though, are a delightful distraction; their antics bring a spark of joy to the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the boy has the audacity to reach for those cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a mix of pride and fear watching him almost lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost poetic how unaware the adult is while the children scheme like tiny masterminds.
segments.speaker: PAR
